brand_compliance_rules.title: Toyota logo must be present
brand_compliance_rules.description: All marketing materials must display the official Toyota logo
brand_compliance_rules.remediation: Add official Toyota logo to the marketing material

brand_compliance_rules.title: Brand name must be capitalized correctly
brand_compliance_rules.description: Toyota must always be capitalized as 'Toyota', never 'TOYOTA' or 'toyota'

brand_compliance_rules.title: Tagline must be official
brand_compliance_rules.description: If tagline is used, it must be an approved Toyota tagline

brand_compliance_rules.title: Font usage must be approved
brand_compliance_rules.description: Only Toyota-approved fonts should be used in marketing materials
